DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate cardiac safety of brentuximab vedotin (SGN-35) in patients with CD30-positive cancers. The study will assess electrical activity of the heart before and after brentuximab vedotin administration. Patients who have stable or improving disease may receive up to 1 year of brentuximab vedotin treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Cardiac Safety Study of Brentuximab Vedotin (SGN-35)
DOC.criteria: Relapsed or refractory CD30positive malignancy Adequate organ function ECOG performance status <2 Cardiac abnormalities (abnormal rhythm, history of significant cardiac event) Current diagnosis of primary cutaneous ALCL Acute or chronic graftversushost disease Prior hematopoietic stem cell transplant within specified timeframe
